page.title: 12 Children's Street Games
page.content: {Â£Kerby'} Another favourite street game is called Kerby which is played by two people.The only equipment needed is a football.One person stands on one side of the road & the other on the opposite side.The idea of the game is to throw the ball across the road & hit the kerb so that the ball bounces back to you.If you bounce the ball & it comes back to you you get one point.You keep doing this until one person gets three points & he or she is the winner. {Â£Please Mr. Crocodile'}One person is on & she calls a colour or an object.If any of the players has a colour or the object she can walk across to the other side but the ones who havn't got it on have to get across without being touched by the caller.The game carries on like this until everyone is caught.
